title: Sophisticated Escape in Switzerland's Famed Spa Country
description: Discover the charming Swiss town of Baden, Switzerland’s wellness destination and spa haven, located just 25-minutes' drive from Zurich. Spend your days getting pampered in the city and your nights at the modern Hotel Du Parc, where you will enjoy daily breakfast, a welcome drink accompanied by a charcuterie board, free entrance to the Grand Casino Baden and one cocktail per person.
